javax.json

Enum JsonPatch.Operation

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<JsonPatch.Operation>
      • javax.json.JsonPatch.Operation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<JsonPatch.Operation>
    Enclosing interface:
    JsonPatch

    public static enum JsonPatch.Operation
extends Enum<JsonPatch.Operation>
    This enum represents the list of valid JSON Patch operations as defined by RFC 6902.
    See Also:
    RFC 6902
